name: Genshin OC Name Generator
description: Struggling to find the perfect name for your Genshin Impact Original Character? Fear no more, Traveler! Our generator crafts unique and evocative names that resonate with the world of Teyvat. Get ready to unleash your creativity!
introduction: Welcome, aspiring character creator! Building a compelling Genshin OC starts with a memorable name. But let's face it, sometimes inspiration just... vanishes. That's where our Genshin OC Name Generator comes in! We blend lore-friendly elements with a dash of creative flair to conjure names that sound like they belong in Mondstadt, Liyue, Inazuma, Sumeru, Fontaine, Natlan, or Snezhnaya. Get ready to discover the moniker your character deserves!
howToUse: Behold! A brand new Genshin-inspired name appears before your very eyes.
Don't like it? Click again! We've got more names than Paimon has emergency food.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your OC's profile. Boom! Instant character depth.
Pro Tip: Mix and match prefixes and suffixes for ultimate customization. You're the master of your own Teyvat destiny!

faqs.question: Are these names actually used in Genshin Impact?
faqs.answer: While we draw inspiration from existing Genshin names and lore, these are original creations designed to fit the aesthetic. Think of them as 'Genshin-adjacent' – names that feel right at home in Teyvat!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for fanfiction or other creative projects?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are yours to use as you see fit. Go forth and populate Teyvat with your amazing OCs!

faqs.question: Are the generated names gender-neutral?
faqs.answer: We strive for a balance! Some names may lean towards a particular gender, but many are designed to be suitable for any character.

faqs.question: How does the generator actually work?
faqs.answer: Magic! Just kidding (sort of). We use a carefully curated list of prefixes and suffixes inspired by Genshin's naming conventions and combine them in interesting ways. It's a little bit of algorithm, a little bit of linguistic artistry.

faqs.question: I generated a really weird name. Is that supposed to happen?
faqs.answer: Hey, sometimes the algorithm gets a little... creative. If you get a name that's truly bizarre, just hit 'Generate' again! We aim for cool, not consistently perfect. Embrace the chaos!

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Feel free to reach out through our contact form with your suggestions. We're always looking for ways to improve and expand our name-generating capabilities.
